00017 // PokerTimer
00018 class Timer : public data::Timer
00019 {
00020 public:
00021     using base_type = data::Timer;
00022     using key_type = decltype(base_type().timer_id());
00023     using time_type = decltype(base_type().timer_milli_seconds());
00024     using pair_type = std::pair<time_type,key_type>;
00025 
00026 public:
00027     bool Serialize(void * buf, size_t buflen, size_t & uselen) const;
00028     bool UnSerialize(void * buf, size_t buflen, size_t &uselen);
00029     void AfterUnSerialize() { }
00030     size_t GetSize() const { return base_type::ByteSize(); }
00031     key_type GetKey() const { return base_type::timer_id(); }
00032     pair_type ToPair() const { return pair_type(base_type::timer_milli_seconds(), base_type::timer_id()); }
00033     std::string ToString() const;
00034 };
00035 
00037 // TimerManager
00038 class TimerManager : public BasicManager<Timer>, public lsf::basic::Singleton<TimerManager>
00039 {
00040 public:
00041     using base_type = BasicManager<Timer>;
00042     using pair_type = Timer::pair_type;
00043     using heap_type = std::priority_queue<pair_type,std::vector<pair_type>,std::greater<pair_type>>;
00044     using func_type = std::function<void(Timer const &)>;
00045     using func_arr_type = std::array<func_type,data::ENTimerType_ARRAYSIZE>;
00046     static const size_t MAX_TIMER_ID = 0xffffff;
00047     static const size_t DEF_TIMER_TICK_INTERVAL = 10;
00048     static const size_t DEF_CHECK_INTERVAL = 30*1000;
00049 
00050 public:
00051     bool Init(uint32_t shm_key, uint32_t max_size);
00052     Timer * CreateTimer(uint64_t milli_second, data::ENTimerType timer_type);
00053     Timer * GetTimer(uint32_t timer_id);
00054     void ReleaseTimer(uint32_t timer_id);
00055     void OnTick();
00056 
00057 public:
00058     template<typename HandlerType>
00059     void AddTimerHandle(data::ENTimerType timer_type, HandlerType&& handler) {
00060         _func_arr[timer_type] = std::forward<HandlerType>(handler);
00061     }
00062 
00063 private:
00064         heap_type _timer_heap;
00065         uint32_t _cur_max_id;
00066     func_arr_type _func_arr;
00067 };
